About this site and the author:

Sophie is a Senior Biology Major with Minors in Psychology & Spanish and is pursuing a Letter of Specialization in Developmental Disabilities & Human Services. Upon graduation, Sophie hopes to earn her PhD in School Psychology, and subsequently become a school and clinical psychologist. Sophie is interested in working with autistic children and their families, in both diagnostic and therapeutic aspects.
